title: Server Meltdown option
body:
Dear Riot staff, to whoever this may concern.

In light of the recent long downtime I wish to ask a few things of you, not to take advantage of you but however to establish a reasoning for the downtime and a reimbursement for our payments.

I'm admitting to spending quite a bit, not on this account but on other accounts too, I continue to support riot in the fantastic game they have created with interesting mechanics, and of course the odd troll.

However I won't stand for this, the downtime we have had from LoL people who help fund your business to succeed are now being ripped off, the request I'm asking for is in lines with world trading policies, if you were to buy an item off ebay you expect a full refund if it became broken.


Awesome time for us to have rewards like loot crates for when situations like this come about.

1) Loot crate rewarded to every player on OCE. I expect at least 3 crates, that saying if 1 is the best you can do its better than nothing.
2) Randomly generated Skin
3) Randomly generated Champion card in loot.
4) Any other beneficial reward that helps us play the game to make up for lost time.
5) Bonus RP per player, this is time we could of actually spent ourselves earning, gaining, or spending.

Either way you look at it something has to give in light of the situation, your a well funded business.

Thanks for reading.{{champion:268}}

replies.body:
There are approximately 183,000 people that play ranked on OCE
we can add around another 100,000-150,000 people for normal ques like twisted treeline and ARAM
lets take your first example, you want three crates and they need to be worth something right? so lets put a costing value of $41AUD on it.

Math time
280,000 x $41= $11,480,000 **For one crate**
that figure there is not exactly accurate but you get the idea that its completely _dumb_ for a 3 hour downtime
Thats also ignoring all of the personal details they'd need to gather to facilitate all of the shipping to get the loot out to everyone. 

Servers have issues, they're losing money every second the servers are down because micro-transactions aren't running, they're not going to give out any reparations for this small issue.

like they are that rich that they aren't willing to give back to the people who made them rich, the community...........Okai yeah I'm not expecting fucking a million dollers each but hey, just a small bonus or even double RP or something for the downtime..........


its not to fucking much to ask than if they are making 11million dollers ............................................................
